verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Go|strong="H1980"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* thee, pitying thy soul, pitying thy \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w love|strong="H0160"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thy espousals, \w when|strong="H1980"\w* thou followedst \w me|strong="H7121"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w*, \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H7121"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w sown|strong="H2232"\w*.

\w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w first|strong="H7225"\w* \w fruits|strong="H7225"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w increase|strong="H8393"\w*: \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* offend: evils \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* ye \w families|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w* \w have|strong="H0001"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w gone|strong="H7368"\w* \w far|strong="H7368"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0001"\w* walked \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* become \w vain|strong="H1892"\w*?

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Where|strong="H0346"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H5927"\w* \w us|strong="H0559"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w out|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*? \w that|strong="H3068"\w* led \w us|strong="H0559"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w desert|strong="H6160"\w*, \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w a|strong="H5927"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w uninhabited|strong="H3427"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* unpassable, \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w a|strong="H5927"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w drought|strong="H6723"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* image \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w death|strong="H6757"\w*, \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w a|strong="H5927"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* wherein \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* walked, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w*?

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w you|strong="H7760"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Carmel, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* thereof, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w best|strong="H2898"\w* \w things|strong="H2898"\w* thereof: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H0935"\w* ye \w entered|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, \w you|strong="H7760"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w an|strong="H7760"\w* \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Where|strong="H0346"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*? \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* held \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w me|strong="H0310"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* pastors \w transgressed|strong="H6586"\w* \w against|strong="H6586"\w* \w me|strong="H0310"\w*: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w followed|strong="H0310"\w* idols.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w contend|strong="H7378"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* judgement \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w you|strong="H3651"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w plead|strong="H7378"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w Pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w isles|strong="H0339"\w* \w of|strong="H0339"\w* Cethim, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*: \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w into|strong="H1961"\w* Cedar, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w consider|strong="H7200"\w* \w diligently|strong="H3966"\w*: \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* hath \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w done|strong="H1961"\w* \w any|strong="H1961"\w* \w thing|strong="H2063"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*.

If \w a|strong="H3808"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* hath \w changed|strong="H4171"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w indeed|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w have|strong="H1471"\w* \w changed|strong="H4171"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w into|strong="H4171"\w* \w an|strong="H0430"\w* idol.

\w Be|strong="H3068"\w* \w astonished|strong="H8074"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* ye \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* ye gates thereof, \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H0834"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* evils. \w They|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* forsaken \w me|strong="H3808"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fountain|strong="H4726"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* digged \w to|strong="H4325"\w* \w themselves|strong="H7451"\w* \w cisterns|strong="H0877"\w*, \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* \w cisterns|strong="H0877"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w can|strong="H0834"\w* \w hold|strong="H3557"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w Is|strong="H1931"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* bondman, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* homeborn \w slave|strong="H5650"\w*? \w why|strong="H4069"\w* \w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w prey|strong="H0957"\w*?

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w lions|strong="H3715"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w roared|strong="H7580"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w noise|strong="H6963"\w*, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* wilderness: \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w are|strong="H0776"\w* burnt \w down|strong="H3427"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w there|strong="H3427"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* none \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1571"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Memphis|strong="H5297"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Taphnes \w have|strong="H1571"\w* deflowered thee, \w even|strong="H1571"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* \w crown|strong="H6936"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* \w head|strong="H6936"\w*.

Hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* thee, \w because|strong="H5800"\w* thou hast forsaken \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, \w when|strong="H6256"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* led thee \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*?

\w And|strong="H4714"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* hast thou \w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* troubled \w water|strong="H4325"\w*? \w And|strong="H4714"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* hast thou \w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w with|strong="H4714"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* Assyrians, \w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w river|strong="H5104"\w*?

Thy own \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w reprove|strong="H3198"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w apostasy|strong="H4878"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w rebuke|strong="H3198"\w* thee. \w Know|strong="H3045"\w* thou, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H7200"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w bitter|strong="H4751"\w* \w thing|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thee, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w left|strong="H5800"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* fear \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* thee, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w Of|strong="H5921"\w* \w old|strong="H5769"\w* \w time|strong="H5769"\w* thou hast \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w*, thou hast \w burst|strong="H5423"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w bands|strong="H4147"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* thou saidst: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w high|strong="H1364"\w* \w hill|strong="H1389"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w green|strong="H7488"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* thou didst \w prostitute|strong="H2181"\w* thyself.

Yet \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w planted|strong="H5193"\w* thee \w a|strong="H5193"\w* chosen vineyard, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w true|strong="H0571"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*: \w how|strong="H0349"\w* \w then|strong="H3605"\w* art thou \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* unto \w me|strong="H3605"\w* \w into|strong="H2015"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* which \w is|strong="H3605"\w* good \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3605"\w*, O strange vineyard?

\w Though|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* thyself \w with|strong="H6440"\w* nitre, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* thyself \w the|strong="H6440"\w* herb borith, thou art stained \w in|strong="H6440"\w* thy \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*.

\w How|strong="H4100"\w* canst thou \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w am|strong="H1980"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* polluted, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* Baalim? \w see|strong="H7200"\w* thy \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w valley|strong="H1516"\w*, \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* thou hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w*: \w as|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w swift|strong="H7031"\w* runner \w pursuing|strong="H0310"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w course|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w A|strong="H4672"\w* \w wild|strong="H6501"\w* ass \w accustomed|strong="H3928"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w desire|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w heart|strong="H5315"\w*, snuffed \w up|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* love: \w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w*: \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fail|strong="H3808"\w*: \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w monthly|strong="H2320"\w* filth \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w Keep|strong="H4513"\w* thy \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* \w from|strong="H7272"\w* being bare, \w and|strong="H7272"\w* thy throat \w from|strong="H7272"\w* \w thirst|strong="H6773"\w*. \w But|strong="H3588"\w* thou saidst: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0157"\w* lost \w all|strong="H0310"\w* hope, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* do \w it|strong="H3588"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0157"\w* \w loved|strong="H0157"\w* \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w*, \w and|strong="H7272"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* walk \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w them|strong="H0310"\w*.
